mapper.sql: select account_no, group_no, bank_info_id, account_type_no, account_type_name, assets, amount, payment_date, account_connection, remarks, receipt_photo from nm_account
mapper.insert: insert into nm_account( group_no, bank_info_id, account_type_no, account_type_name, assets, amount, payment_date, account_connection, remarks, receipt_photo) values( #{groupNo}, #{bankInfoId}, #{accountTypeNo}, #{accountTypeName}, #{assets}, #{amount}, #{paymentDate}, #{accountConnection}, #{remarks}, #{receiptPhoto})
mapper.update: update nm_account set bank_info_no=#{bankInfoNo}, account_type_no=#{accountTypeNo}, account_type_name=#{accountTypeName}, assets=#{assets}, amount=#{amount}, payment_date=#{paymentDate}, account_connection=#{accountConnection}, remarks=#{remarks}, receipt_photo=#{receiptPhoto} where account_no=#{accountNo}
